commit.message:
cstand.adb: Fix comments.

2011-08-01  Geert Bosch  <bosch@adacore.com>

	* cstand.adb: Fix comments.
	* sem_prag.adb (Analyze_Pragma): Use List_Length instead of explicit
	count of arguments.

From-SVN: r177024
